com.cloudmade.api
Class CMClient

java.lang.Object
  com.cloudmade.api.CMClient

public class CMClient
extends java.lang.Object

Client to CloudMade's services API Client object is initialized by user credentials (apikey) as well as target (i.e. cloudmade) host, port, etc.

Author:
Mykola Paliyenko

Method Detail

getTile

public byte[] getTile(double latitude,
                      double longitude,
                      int zoom,
                      int styleId,
                      int size)
Get tile with given latitude, longitude, zoom, styleId and size as a bytes of the tile image (PNG file)

Parameters:
latitude - latitude of requested tile
longitude - longitude of requested tile
zoom - zoom level, on which tile is being requested (0-18)
styleId - style id of the requested tile
size - length of requested tiles' sides (64 or 256)
Returns:
tile image (PNG file) as byte array

find

public GeoResults find(java.lang.String query,
                       int results,
                       int skip,
                       BBox bbox,
                       boolean bboxOnly,
                       boolean returnGeometry,
                       boolean returnLocation)
Find objects that match given query

Query should be in format [POI],[House Number],[Street],[City],[County],[Country] (comma separated names of geo objects from small to big) like Potsdamer Platz, Berlin, Germany. Also supports "near" in queries, e.g. hotel near Potsdamer Platz, Berlin, Germany

Parameters:
query - Query by which objects should be searched.
results - How many results should be returned.
skip - Number of results to skip from beginning.
bbox - Bounding box in which objects should be searched.
bboxOnly - If set to false, results will be searched in the whole world if there are no results for a given bbox.
returnGeometry - If set to true, adds geometry in returned results. Otherwise only centroid returned.
returnLocation - If set to true, adds location information in returned results. This might have some negative impact on performance of query, please use it wisely.
Returns:
GeoResults object with found results.

findClosest

public GeoResult findClosest(java.lang.String object_type,
                             Point point)
                      throws ObjectNotFoundException
Find closest object of the given type to a given point.

For a list of available object types, see: http://www.cloudmade.com/developers/docs/geocoding-http-api/object_types

Parameters:
object_type - Type of object, that should be searched
point - Closes object to this point will be searched.
Returns:
found object
Throws:
ObjectNotFoundException - Thrown when no object could be found in radius of 50 km from point.

route

public Route route(Point start,
                   Point end,
                   CMClient.RouteType routeType,
                   java.util.List<Point> transitPoints,
                   CMClient.RouteTypeModifier typeModifier,
                   java.lang.String lang,
                   CMClient.MeasureUnit units)
            throws RouteNotFoundException
Find route between two points with given paramteres.

Parameters:
start - Starting point
end - Ending point
routeType - Type of route, e.g. car, foot, etc.
transitPoints - List of points route must visit before reaching end. Points are visited in the same order they are specified in the sequence. Set it to null if you do not need it.
typeModifier - Modifier of the route type, e.g. shortest
lang - Language code in conformance to `ISO 3166-1 alpha-2` standard
units - Measure units for distance calculation (km/miles)
Returns:
Route that was found
Throws:
RouteNotFoundException - If no route found between points.
